arts.ttl: Marotta defends Inter midst Cardinale’s controversial remarks
arts.sum: Inter President Beppe Marotta issued a strong response to AC Milan owner Gerry Cardinale’s recent remarks, which criticized Inter’s financial management under Steven Zhang and referred to the club’s situation as a “bankruptcy.” Speaking to Sky Italia before Inter’s match against Como at San Siro, Marotta addressed the controversy head-on. On Serie A Competitiveness “I didn’t expect such competitiveness in our league. Compared to other European leagues, ours has always been more challenging. arts.ttl: Juventus, Inter, and Napoli eye Ismajli as Empoli explores free agent market
arts.sum: Ardian Ismajli, the Albanian center-back, has caught the attention of Serie A giants Juventus, Inter, and Napoli as his contract with Empoli nears its end. The 28-year-old defender has reportedly rejected a contract extension offer from Empoli, setting the stage for a potential high-profile move. arts.sum: Javier Zanetti attended the match against Roma at the Sinigaglia, and yesterday Simone Inzaghi made his opinion of the young talent clear: “ He has quality, a good physique and a great foot . Nico Paz has established himself as one of the most promising stars in Serie A .
